name: Tankz (Nathaniel Richards)
description:
An endless wave-based tank-free for all. I am making a series making games and this is what I made after 3 weeks of learning game development. I just wanted t get this out there so I had something to show for it. Keep up with me and see new games I post as I continue my journey.

1.0.1

  • Fixed bug with player shooting

Controls - W, A, S, D
